intro: Aldama hypoleuca, commonly known as the white-leaf aldama, is a flowering plant native to Mexico. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. Aldama hypoleuca is often found in regions with well-drained soils and full sun exposure.
